```{r}
library("tibble")
library("tidyr")
library("readr")
library("here")
```

```{r}
n_obs <- 10

get_data <- function(){
  tibble(
    category = LETTERS[seq(n_obs)],
    number = round(rnorm(n_obs, 100, 50))
  )  
}
```

```{r}
data_01 <- get_data()
data_02 <- get_data()
```

```{r}
data_01
data_02
```

```{r}
write_csv(data_01, here("data-raw", "data_01.csv"))
write_csv(data_02, here("data-raw", "data_02.csv"))
```
